intellimate.izou.resource

Interface ResourceBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identifiable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContentGenerator

    public interface ResourceBuilder
extends Identifiable
    This interface is used to provide resources to other parts of the application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> announceEvents()
      this method is called to register for what Events it wants to provide Resources.
      java.util.List<Resource> announceResources()
      this method is called to register what resources the object provides.
      java.util.List<Resource> provideResource(java.util.List<Resource> resources, java.util.Optional<Event> event)
      this method is called when an object wants to get a Resource.

      • Methods inherited from interface intellimate.izou.system.Identifiable

        getID, isOwner

    • Method Detail

      • announceResources

        java.util.List<Resource> announceResources()
        this method is called to register what resources the object provides. just pass a List of Resources without Data in it.
        Returns:
        a List containing the resources the object provides

      • announceEvents

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> announceEvents()
        this method is called to register for what Events it wants to provide Resources.
        Returns:
        a List containing ID's for the Events

      • provideResource

        java.util.List<Resource> provideResource(java.util.List<Resource> resources,
                                         java.util.Optional<Event> event)
        this method is called when an object wants to get a Resource. it has as an argument resource instances without data, which just need to get populated.
        Parameters:
        resources - a list of resources without data
        event - if an event caused the action, it gets passed. It can also be null.
        Returns:
        a list of resources with data
